content: this closet staple is the perfect top for beginners looking to take the plunge into making garments this tutorial walks you through not only the steps but the thought process behind designing this top so you can make it exactly to your liking and apply these skills to future projects as well sizing - made to measure **yarn** - this pattern has been tested with tynn line by sandnes garn a light-fingering yarn with a drapey hand is recommended yarns that contain tencel or silk would be a great option
